name: cat sweeper
description:
this is a small game that runs in the terminal on your computer.I hope you have fun playing it

the goal of the game is to get all the boxes --> # without hitting one that contains a bomb, If you hit a bomb you lose.

as a personal sidenote sometimes on the winner and loser screens you have to hit Y or N twice

                                                                          ^._.^ good luck!   ^._.^
